org.mindroid.api

Class ImperativeWorkshopAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.api.BasicAPI
      • org.mindroid.api.ImperativeAPI
        • org.mindroid.api.ImperativeWorkshopAPI

  • public abstract class ImperativeWorkshopAPI
extends org.mindroid.api.ImperativeAPI
    This API is build on the Imperative API. It is used for the Mindroid Workshop of the TU-Darmstadt Real-Time Systems Lab and is used with a specific robot-Setup. It provides Methods to control the robot properly.

        Returns:

        public float getAngle()
        Returns the current Angle of the robot given by the Gyrosensor.
        Returns:
        angle in degree

      • turnLeft

        public final void turnLeft(int degrees)
        The robot rotates counterclockwise by the given angle. This method blocks until the rotation is completed. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in degrees

      • turnLeft

        public final void turnLeft(int degrees,
                           int speed)
        The robot rotates counterclockwise by the given angle. This method blocks until the rotation is completed. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn
        speed - speed 0 - 1000

      • turnRight

        public final void turnRight(int degrees)
        The robot rotates clockwise by the given angle. The method blocks until the rotation is completed. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        degrees - angle

      • turnRight

        public final void turnRight(int degrees,
                            int speed)
        The robot rotates clockwise by the given angle. The method blocks until the rotation is completed. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        degrees - degrees to turn
        speed - speed 0 - 1000

      • stop

        public void stop(org.mindroid.impl.ev3.EV3PortID motorport)
        Stops the Motor at the given Port.
        Parameters:
        motorport - - port of the motor to stop

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the left and right motor of the robot. Synchronized and blocking operation.

      • enableFloatMode

        public void enableFloatMode()
        Sets the left and right motor into float mode. Synchronized and blocking operation. Returns without action if system got interrupted.

      • forward

        public void forward(int speed)
        Starts driving driveDistanceForward and returns immediately. Returns without action if system got interrupted. Use stop() to stop driving.
        Parameters:
        speed - - speed of the motors [0-1000] deg/sec. Possible MaxSpeed depends on battery power!

      • forward

        public void forward()
        Drives forward. The current speed will be used.

      • driveDistanceForward

        public void driveDistanceForward(float distance)
        Drives forward. Synchronized motor operation and blocking method. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm

      • driveDistanceForward

        public void driveDistanceForward(float distance,
                                 int speed)
        Drives forward. Synchronized motor operation and blocking method. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm
        speed - - speed

      • backward

        public void backward(int speed)
        Starts driving backward and returns immediately. Returns without action if system got interrupted. Use stop() to stop driving.
        Parameters:
        speed - - speed of the motors [0-1000] deg/sec. Possible MaxSpeed depends on battery power!

      • backward

        public void backward()
        Drives Backward. The current speed will be used.

      • driveDistanceBackward

        public void driveDistanceBackward(float distance)
        Drives backward. Synchronized motor operation and blocking method. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive in cm

      • driveDistanceBackward

        public void driveDistanceBackward(float distance,
                                  int speed)
        Drives backward. Synchronized motor operation and blocking method. Returns without action if system got interrupted.
        Parameters:
        distance - - distance to drive
        speed - - speed
